TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AmbientPropertyValue extends System.Object

summary.span: 報告環境屬性的相關資訊，做為 實作的一部分。

span.span: Reports information about an ambient property, as part of an implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示藉由呼叫傳回的資訊項目服務方法。 represents an information item that is returned by calling an service method. `GetAll`列舉型別或陣列的方法會傳回項目;`GetFirst`方法會傳回單一。The `GetAll` methods return enumerations or arrays of items; the `GetFirst` methods return a single . ## 關於環境的屬性About Ambient Properties 環境屬性是其屬性值應該是可用來在 XAML 節點結構的值轉換器使用方式以及其下的物件圖形的屬性。An ambient property is a property whose property value should be available to value converter usage in the XAML node structure and to the object graph underneath it. 環境概念是相關 XAML 處理器在載入路徑的物件撰寫階段或儲存的序列化階段期間的路徑。The ambient concept is relevant for a XAML processor during the object-writing phase of the load path or the serialization phase of a save path. 型別也可歸因環境。A type can also be attributed as ambient. 在此情況下，使用屬性化的類型的所有屬性會都報告環境。In this case, all properties that use the attributed type are reported as ambient. 在載入路徑案例中，環境屬性值可能會影響 XAML 節點結構中存在其下方的其他屬性的物件圖形產生值。In the load path case, the ambient property value might influence the object graph produced value of other properties that exist underneath it in a XAML node structure. 當處理成 XAML 節點資料流，環境的概念表示，環境屬性值必須是適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸模組，從`StartObject`至`EndObject`。When processed as a XAML node stream, the ambient concept implies that the ambient property value must be available to type converters and markup extensions from `StartObject` to `EndObject`. 同樣地，類型轉換器或標記延伸，可針對儲存路徑可以查閱環境的屬性和它的值。Similarly, a type converter or markup extension that is used for the save path can look up the ambient property and its value. 因此，產生的 XAML 是較佳的反覆存取表示。Therefore, the XAML that is produced is a better round-trip representation. 根據其語言定義中，XAML 所指定的物件的成員必須處理的順序。By its language definition, XAML does not specify the order in which members of an object must be processed. 不過，任何環境屬性值必須先處理由 XAML 讀取器，讓類型轉換器和標記延伸使用方式包含在其他內容中可以存取透過服務。However, any ambient property value must be processed first by the XAML reader so that the type converter and markup extension usage that are contained in other properties can access it through the service. 是一種類似的概念，也會影響 XAML 節點處理順序。 is a similar concept that also influences XAML node-processing order. 不過，僅適用於對等成員與節點關聯性，所以無法影響所有下階。However, can only be used for peer member and node relationships; it cannot influence all descendants. 此外，直接影響物件圖表屬性設定，而環境的技術會依賴型別轉換器或標記延伸模組。Also, directly influences object graph property setting, whereas the ambient technique relies on type converters or markup extensions. 在環境的技術，必須也有特定的型別轉換器或標記延伸模組定義。In the ambient technique, there must also be a specific type converter or markup extension definition. 這是由每個型別轉換器或標記延伸，以判斷應該如何解譯和套用至型別轉換器或標記延伸的使用位置的圖形物件位置的環境屬性值。It is up to each type converter or markup extension to determine how the ambient property value should be interpreted and applied to the object graph location where the type converter or markup extension is used. ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 所示的環境屬性案例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能集是，這可以限定所需的屬性名稱查閱其他值。An ambient property scenario that is illustrated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] feature set is , which can qualify the necessary property name lookups for other values. 在此情況下，值會限定中下方的 XAML 節點的值。In this case, the value qualifies the values in the XAML nodes underneath it. 使用的型別轉換子行為。 uses the type converter behavior for a . 此行為存取環境值，藉由查詢從適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸的服務內容。This behavior accesses the ambient value by querying from a service context that is available to type converters and markup extensions.
